name: Roman Saldygashev's home page
body:
### About I'm shader writer / R&D engineer. I like programming and challenging problems of computer graphics imaginary. E-mail: sldg.roman@gmail.com Resume: ### Personal projects [PhyShader for Mantra](https://github.com/groundflyer/physhader-for-mantra): a set of physical based shaders for Mantra renderer. ### Gallery

Making of Hard Landing from Roman Saldygashev on Vimeo.
